text: This is a list of characters in the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion. == Children == * Shinji Ikari * Rei Ayanami * Asuka Soryu Langley * Toji Suzuhara * Kaworu Nagisa * Mari Makinami Illustrious == NERV == * Gendo Ikari * Misato Katsuragi * Ritsuko Akagi * Kozo Fuyutsuki * Ryoji Kaji * Shigeru Aoba * Makoto Hyuga * Maya Ibuki == Shinji Classmates == * Kensuke Aida * Hikari Hokari == Others == * Keel Lorenz * Pen-Pen == Angels == Category:Anime characters
title: List of Neon Genesis Evangelion characters
